segments.text: Good morning , nurse . I want to see the dentist , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . It's very urgent . I feel awful . I have a terrible toothache .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you come at 10 am on Monday , April 24th ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I must see the dentist now , nurse .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The dentist is very busy at the moment . Can you come at 2 PM ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's very late . Can the dentist see me now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid that he can't , Mr Croft . Can't you wait till this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can wait , but my toothache can't !
segments.speaker: S2
